syntax: if('@replenqty' > 0) {[select 'replenqty,rpluom' dvc_var_nam, '0,0' dvc_ena_flg, '1,1' dvc_vis_flg, to_char(@replenqty * pd.untqty) intreplenqty, to_char(@origqty*pdori.untqty) intorigqty from prtftp_dtl pd join prtftp_dtl pdori on pd.prtnum = pdori.prtnum and pd.prt_client_id = pdori.prt_client_id and pd.wh_id = pdori.wh_id and pd.ftpcod = pdori.ftpcod and pdori.uomcod = '@origuom' where pd.prtnum = '@prtnum' and pd.prt_client_id = '@prt_client_id' and pd.ftpcod = '@ftpcod' and pd.uomcod = '@rpluom' and pd.wh_id= '@global.wh_id']} else {publish data where dvc_var_nam = 'replenqty,rpluom' and dvc_ena_flg = '1,1' and dvc_vis_flg = '1,1'}
